titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to access and inspect privatized military housing units, and for other purposes.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to access and inspect privatized military housing units, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: This bill gives the Department of Defense the authority to inspect a completed military-housing project developed and operated by a private developer.
